I explained his situation to the coaches, asking them to let him join only if he expressed interest. Otherwise, I was prepared for him to simply watch, as he usually did.

Chanced upon BearyFun Gym Katong when I was searching for a gym for my toddler and signed up for a trial class. Based off first impressions, they were very prompt with their replies, professional and friendly (replies still are prompt even after I signed up), not hard sell at all.

What sealed the deal for me to sign him up, was how professional their coaches Ms Joanne and Ms D are! Even with a class full of (sometimes rowdy) toddlers, I've observed that they are both attentive and encouraging - not just encouraging to the kids but towards the parents as well :')

There was once my toddler suddenly had a meltdown and I was flustered, frustrated and just feeling awful about it. Then after class, Ms D came up to me and was just so sweet and assuring. It's the little things like that, that make a difference.

Both Ms Joanne and Ms D also know how to read the room really well, when the toddlers all happen to be rowdy or distracted, they will do a different activity to get their attention again. My toddler likes to wander off and they would always try to get his attention to get him to participate.

The toddlers are always so happy to see the both of them, especially since they are always so chirpy and smiley! (The other coaches who sometimes join the class are just as lovely!)

Thank you guys for such a great experience. :)

I enrolled my 3 year old about 3 months ago. He always looks forward to gym class here. The coaches are sweet, encouraging and provide good feedback. I've seen tremendous improvement in his confidence at navigating climbing structures at the playground, and an increased willingness to engage in risky play, where previously he was overly cautious. The waiting area for parents is comfortable and you can observe your child during lessons.

My boys have been attending this gym for the past 2 years. The coaches are kind and friendly. Always motivating the boys to do better. My boys are now more flexible and have learnt so much from the coaches. The coaches always update the parents on the kids progress. The boys look forward to their classes every week. Special thanks to Ms Joanne and Mr Yippi.
